author: TAZ
title: Ground News - Flood situation: Elbe level falls, Weser rises
text:
Summary by TAZ The flood situation in northwestern and eastern Germany is likely to remain tense on Friday as well. What is important is how much rain is still falling. more... Share menu More
Filters 2 Articles 2 Articles All Left Center Right
TAZ Flood situation: Elbe level falls, Weser rises The flood situation in northwestern and eastern Germany is likely to remain tense on Friday as well. What is important is how much rain is still falling. more...

Flood situation: Elbe level falls, Weser rises The flood situation in northwestern and eastern Germany is likely to remain tense on Friday as well. What is important is how much rain is still falling. more...
2 hours ago Read Full Article stern.de Independent: Bertelsmann Stiftung Flood situation in Dresden eases: Elbe level falls The flood situation on the Elbe in Dresden is easing a bit. Since Friday night, the Elbe level has been falling again, according to data from the State Flood Center. For a short time, the Elbe had reached a level of 5.95 meters. Dresden's environmental mayor Eva Jähnigen (Greens) explained on Deutschlandfunk in the morning that alert level 3 should be reduced over the course of Friday. All protective measures had taken effect; there had been no …
